DOC.brief_summary: Examination of CRT efficacy in patients with progressive heart failure and atrial fibrillation at the same time
DOC.brief_title: PAF-HEFT (Permanent Atrial Fibrillation in Heart Failure Trial)
DOC.criteria: LVEF <35% QRS time ≥150ms LBB NYHA classification ≥ NYHA III permanent (> 6 months) Atrial Fibrillation sinus rhythm (control group) Condition after Implantation of a Medtronic CRT device written informed consent exchange of the current CRT device mitral incompetence (2. degree) no compliance participation in another study pregnancy patients with AV node patients after heart transplant or those who are on the transplant list
